original_title: UFC Fight Night 208: Blaydes vs. Aspinall
overview: UFC Fight Night 208: Blaydes vs. Aspinall was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on July 23, 2022, at The O2 Arena in London, England. A heavyweight bout between Curtis Blaydes and Tom Aspinall headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 208: Blaydes vs. Aspinall
